data.text: O! Mawu, wòe nye nye Mawu,
Esi wò lɔlɔ̃ nyo wu agbe ta la,
Makafu wò, zi ale si mele agbe,
Nye luʋɔ aɖi ƒo abe nuɖuɖu nyuitɔ kekeakee wòɖu ene;
Le nye aba dzi, meɖoa ŋku dziwò,
Esi nènye nye xɔnametɔ ta la,
Nye luʋɔ ku ɖe ŋuwò goŋgoŋgoŋ,
Woatsrɔ̃ ame siwo le nye agbe yome tim,
Woatsɔ wo ade asi na yi,
Ke fia la akpɔ dzidzɔ le Mawu me;
